summary: This bill, H.R. 1813, aims to amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966. It focuses on setting maximum monthly allowances for milk for participants in the Special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants, and Children (WIC). The bill specifies the maximum quart allowances for milk based on different food packages (IV, V, VI, and VII) as defined in 7 CFR 246.10(e).
